text: 8.11 Sng 107.3, Luk 13.29 Pen yad nɨbop agebin, binɨb pal okok nɨb okok, ogɨnap sub lɨm gup okok ken apɨl, ogɨnap sub saŋɨd amub okok ken apɨl, kɨli ownɨgabal agak. Apɨl, God binɨb dɨl kɨlop kod yenɨgab nab ak mɨdɨl, mɨñmɨñ gɨlɨg tap ñɨbɨlɨg yenɨgabal agak. Kɨli Eblaham ayɨp, Aysak ayɨp, Jekop ayɨp mɨñmɨñ gɨlɨg tap ñɨbɨlɨg yenɨgabal agak.
